name: Novasama Technologies
longDescription: We are building high quality and community-oriented apps for Polkadot & Kusama ecosystem

name: ChaosDAO
shortDescription: Community org with a dedicated internal voting process and multisig for OpenGov referenda
longDescription: ChaosDAO is a curated community of Polkadot & Kusama natives. Our members are involved with every aspect of the ecosystem as developers, community organizers, Twitter and YouTube educators, and as ordinary retail investors. As part of our own organization‚Äôs evolution we have developed a robust internal governance mechanism to determine how our community will publicly vote on referenda. By voting on behalf of the long-time Dotsama community we hope to ensure that only referenda that benefit the ecosystem are voted in.

name: Anton Khvorov
longDescription:
## About me
My name is Anton Khvorov, I‚Äôm CEO of [Novasama Technologies](https://novasama.io) & Head of Engineering @ [Nova Wallet](https://novawallet.io).
Passionate to build new innovative & amazing
products, with a mindset to make the world a better place.

## Voting strategy 

I do support referendums focused on the core values of Polkadot (decentralization, democracy, interoperability, reliability), as well as referendums that are focused on brining the power of Polkadot to mass adoption (products with great UX, open source, etc). 

I do not support entities that are active against any of these values and/or human rights. 

I often express my opinion on Polkassembly, especially in the case of controversial referendums.

## Incentives
Each month I‚Äôm going to mint & send NFT with my cat to each of my fellow delegators! üêä

![](https://i.ibb.co/5YtW1hn/Pelmeshka-small.jpg)

## Stay in touch!
If you have any questions regarding my votes, feel free to contact me via email: anton@novawallet.io

name: Will | Paradox | ParaNodes.io
shortDescription: Kusama Council & Validator Operator at ParaNodes.io
longDescription:
## About me
My name is Will and I'm a member of Kusama's outgoing council.  My council experience allows me to better understand the technical aspects of governance and appreciate the general 'values' of the chain.

I am also a well known within the validator community and operate validators under the moniker [ParaNodes.io](https://paranodes.io).

If you'll like to hear my thoughts on governance, please tune in to [AAG](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtyd7v_I7PGkXbJmKojrZ1KXwspR1JkpV) I make live appearances on the first Monday of each month.

name: Leemo
shortDescription: Hi I'm Leemo! A frequent governance enjoyoooor and active Polkadot ecosystem community member.
longDescription:
üòªChief Nice Officer at Nova Wallet
ü§ñDoing cool shit with Robonomics
‚òØÔ∏èCo-founder of ChaosDAO
üåÖCo-founder of GmOrDie
üêçCouncillor at HydraDX & Basilisk
I'm an active Polkadot ecosystem governance participator, and often share my insights over at [my Twitter](https://twitter.com/LeemoXD), within various communities such as ChaosDAO, Polkahaus, and the Polkadot/Kusama directions channel.
I frequent the weekly episodic podcast [Attempts at Governance](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hboOYAmindk&list=PLtyd7v_I7PGkXbJmKojrZ1KXwspR1JkpV), where I often give updates about governance topics and participate in discussion.
I'm often looking for new ways for communities to excel in Governance and have lead the implementation and continued operations of ChaosDAO's governance participation. You can find out more about this setup [in this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MqY6yU-YLO0).
